text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Youth organisations welcomed President Ben Alis' speech on Saturday in parliament.
- Tunisians send 110,000 cards with good year wishes, post service says.
- Foreign affairs minister and Chinese foreign affairs vice-minister talk on boosting cooperation.
- President's speech in parliament on Saturday was a boost to the national economy and to the democratic institutions.
